scripts.serve-api: screen -dmS api bash -c 'cd public && php -S localhost:1080'
scripts.stop-api: screen -S api -X at '#' stuff $'\003' && screen -S api -X quit
scripts.serve-ui: screen -dmS ui bash -c 'cd ui && npm run serve'
scripts.stop-ui: screen -S ui -X at '#' stuff $'\003' && screen -S ui -X quit
